name: Fashion Inc.
description:
* Start your own fashion empire in this amazing idle clicker adventure game!
* Open up shops in NYC, Paris.
* Attract and serve customers, unlock exciting clothing items, upgrade your tills, items and manager, run marketing campaigns and tap tap tap your way to the top of the fashion world!!
* Stay ahead of the game by making the most of the TRENDS to maximise profits!

Warning mega-addiction inbound...but it'll be worth it.
